job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Front-end Developer on the Halo team, you'll help build an easy-to-use interface for our AI platform. Our platform empowers businesses with advanced AI technologies-like agentic AI and a customizable knowledge base. You'll work closely with the rest of the team to turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages. You will, amongst others:
     * Develop & Optimize:
       Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3. Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP.
     * Design & User Experience:
       Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design. Your ideas will help guide the layout and interactions to ensure a smooth experience for all users.
     * AI Integration:
       Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end, making advanced tools easy to use.
     * Innovation & Experimentation:
       Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly. Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
     * Performance & Scalability:
       Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online, so everyone enjoys a smooth experience.

   Join us on the Halo team and use your front-end skills to help shape the future of AI-powered business tools.

You connect with us, if you

   Feel connected to our Shared Values
     * Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
     * Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
     * Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
     * Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.

   You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation., As a Club Member, you'll unlock a world of incredible benefits:
     * Fuel your mind: Daily healthy lunches and snacks to keep you energized.
     * Effortless commutes: Shuttle mobility cards and company cars get you where you need to be.
     * Invest in your future: A solid pension plan.
     * Take your time off: 25 vacation days with the option to buy 10 more to provide peace of mind.
     * Own your success: Become a shareholder with our Employee Share Purchase Program.
     * Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
     * Life's a party: Weekly drinks, board game nights, karaoke throwdowns, yearly ski trip, and more! We have something for everyone.
job_details.full_text:
Developer (Halo)

As a Front-end Developer on the Halo team, you'll help build an easy-to-use interface for our AI platform. Our platform empowers businesses with advanced AI technologies-like agentic AI and a customizable knowledge base. You'll work closely with the rest of the team to turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages. You will, amongst others:
     * Develop & Optimize:
       Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3. Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP.
     * Design & User Experience:
       Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design. Your ideas will help guide the layout and interactions to ensure a smooth experience for all users.
     * AI Integration:
       Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end, making advanced tools easy to use.
     * Innovation & Experimentation:
       Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly. Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
     * Performance & Scalability:
       Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online, so everyone enjoys a smooth experience.

   Join us on the Halo team and use your front-end skills to help shape the future of AI-powered business tools.

You connect with us, if you

   Feel connected to our Shared Values
     * Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
     * Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
     * Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
     * Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.

   You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation., As a Club Member, you'll unlock a world of incredible benefits:
     * Fuel your mind: Daily healthy lunches and snacks to keep you energized.
     * Effortless commutes: Shuttle mobility cards and company cars get you where you need to be.
     * Invest in your future: A solid pension plan.
     * Take your time off: 25 vacation days with the option to buy 10 more to provide peace of mind.
     * Own your success: Become a shareholder with our Employee Share Purchase Program.
     * Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
     * Life's a party: Weekly drinks, board game nights, karaoke throwdowns, yearly ski trip, and more! We have something for everyone.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development (Vue 3, web interface, user experience) and integrating AI features into the front-end. While it mentions AI technologies like LLMs and agentic AI, the core responsibilities and required skills are centered around building user interfaces rather than developing, fine-tuning, or deploying the AI models themselves. The role is more about consuming AI services through an interface than building the AI core. Therefore, it does not fit the 'ML Engineer' or 'GenAI Engineer' profiles, which require deep involvement in model development or advanced generative AI system architecture. It leans towards traditional software development with AI integration, making 'Ambiguous' the most appropriate classification as it's not a core AI engineering role but rather a role that utilizes AI services.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3', 'Create interactive pages', and 'bring AI features to the front-end', which are core software development activities for user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating user interfaces and ensuring they are fast, responsive, and scalable, which are key aspects of front-end software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the interface is fast and responsive

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages', indicating a focus on building user-facing software.
job_tasks.phrase: turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP' implies interaction with and integration of AI models, though the development of these models is not the primary focus.
job_tasks.phrase: connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'agentic AI' and 'customizable knowledge base' points to the use of advanced AI technologies, even if the role is focused on the front-end integration.
job_tasks.phrase: agentic AI and a customizable knowledge base

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with ML engineers and back-end developers to integrate AI features into the front-end, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'making advanced tools easy to use' suggests working with and presenting the output of AI models to the end-user.
job_tasks.phrase: making advanced tools easy to use

job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'shaping a clean and effective design' and ensuring a 'smooth experience for all users' falls under user experience design within software development.
job_tasks.phrase: shape a clean and effective design

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly' and 'Experiment with different ideas' is part of the software development lifecycle.
The job description mentions 'AI platform' and 'AI technologies', indicating exposure to and integration with AI systems.
The phrase 'AI-powered business tools' implies working with systems that leverage AI.
The mention of 'NLP' (Natural Language Processing) is a specific area within AI that the platform utilizes.

soft_skills.phrase: passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development
eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation
Experiment with different ideas to find what works best
